## Repository.findOneByIdOrThrow() method

Find one doc by id or throw error if doc is not found

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  id | [MongoIdStr](./subito-connector-mongodb.mongoidstr.md) | The doc id |
